transportation.name: Round-trip Flight from Gainesville to Paris
transportation.description: Round-trip economy flight from Gainesville Regional Airport to Charles de Gaulle Airport.

vacation.climate: April in Paris typically experiences mild temperatures ranging from 50°F to 65°F (10°C to 18°C) with occasional rain.

day1.day_description: Arrival in Paris and introduction to the city, starting with famous landmarks.

activities.title: Eiffel Tower Visit
activities.description: Experience breathtaking views of Paris from the top of the iconic Eiffel Tower.

activities.title: Café de Flore
activities.description: Famous café known for its literary history, serving delicious French pastries and coffee.

day2.day_description: Explore the artistic history of Paris, visiting notable museums and enjoying local cuisine.

activities.title: Louvre Museum Tour
activities.description: Visit the world-renowned art museum housing thousands of works including the Mona Lisa.

activities.title: Le Relais de l'Entrecôte
activities.description: Enjoy a classic French steak-frites experience at this popular bistro.

day3.day_description: Last day for shopping and relaxation, indulging in traditional French desserts.

activities.title: Shopping in Le Marais
activities.description: Explore trendy boutiques and vintage shops in this historic district of Paris.

activities.title: Pierre Hermé
activities.description: Treat yourself to exquisite French pastries and macarons from this renowned patisserie.
